name: ListOrgMembers
description:
Retrieve members of a GitHub organization.

Use this tool to list all users who are members of a specified GitHub organization, including both concealed and public members if authenticated.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization to list members from. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: filter_members
parameters.description: Filter the list of members. Use '2fa_disabled' to list members without two-factor authentication.

value_schema.description: Filter members returned in the list. `2fa_disabled` means that only members without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned. This options is only available for organization owners.

parameters.name: member_role_filter
parameters.description: Filter members by their role in the organization ('all', 'admin', 'member').

value_schema.description: Filter members returned by their role.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch. Use this to navigate through paginated results.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter members returned in the list. `2fa_disabled` means that only members without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned. This options is only available for organization owners.

value_schema.description: Filter members returned in the list. `2fa_disabled` means that only members without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned. This options is only available for organization owners.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter members returned by their role.

value_schema.description: Filter members returned by their role.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
